<title level="1" pfs="">[False Priest](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3537)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Belief is perhaps the strongest force in the universe. Instilling belief only to use it against someone in deceit, however, is the purview of a false priest.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[False Priest](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3537)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 98

**Perception** +10

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +12, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) +12, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46) +8, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[alchemical tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=59) (used as “blessed items” to fool marks), [Backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=4), cloak, collection of fake relics, [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (20 bolts), [Rapier](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36), [wooden religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2745), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +10 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 50

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rapier +12 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+8 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+8 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +12 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+4 piercing

**Deceiver's Surprise**   On the first round of combat, if the false priest rolls [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) or [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) for initiative, creatures that haven't acted yet are [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) to them.

**Fickle Prophecy** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The false priest convinces another creature of their omnipotence by attempting a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) check compared to the creature's Will DC. If successful, the target gains 1d8+4 temporary Hit Points that last for 1 hour or until the false priest removes them by rebuking the target, whichever occurs first.

**The Jig Is Up** <actions string="Reaction" />  **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** The false priest critically fails a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) or [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) check; **Effect** The false priest Strides.

**Sneak Attack**   The false priest deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures. This increases to 2d6 against creatures off-guard due to the false priest's [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=2390) or deceiver's surprise.

</column>
